title: This family suicide photo is neither related to lockdown nor to ‘Hindus killed in Pakistan’
subtitle: The image is old and is neither related to lockdown nor Pakistan. Police interrogation revealed poverty and inability to pay their debts as the reason for suicide.
author: factly.in
vclaim:
An image is being widely shared on social media claiming that a family had committed suicide due to the lack of relief support from the government during the lockdown. The image shows four members hanging from an iron pipe. FACTLY has found the same image in a forensic research article published in October 2019. In the article, it was mentioned that the Police interrogation revealed poverty and inability to pay their debts as the reason for suicide. Some users have posted the same photo on Twitter with the claim that it shows the plight of Hindus in Pakistan. But, in the article, it can be read that incident is related to India. So, the image is old and is neither related to lockdown nor Pakistan.
